overview: Taken on a trip to the sleaziest, sexiest parts of Germany’s capital, we’re given the first class ride into the depths of sexual depravity, spying on as much outdoor cruising as we can, catching cyclists having cheeky wanks in the bushes and leather clad studs whipping thick dick out on rooftops and stroking them until they explode with thick German juice! Capturing the best of the Berlin population at their uninhibited best, we enjoy musclemen, leather daddies and scally boys all out to shoot their load wherever they may be.
title: Berlin Fuckers
